greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 4*floor(n/2) + ceiling((n-1)^2/2).
comment: a(n) gives the maximum number of inversions in a permutation on n + 2 symbols consisting of a single n-cycle and 2 fixed points.
Sequence is a diagonal of A326296.
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,0,-2,1).
formula: E.g.f.: (1/4)*(5*exp(-x) + exp(x)*(-1 + 6*x  + 2*x^2)). - _Stefano Spezia_, Sep 16 2019 after _Colin Barker_
results.author: _M. Ryan Julian Jr._, Sep 12 2019
